title: TG:GeckoAI
author: TG:GeckoAI
content: Hello, everyone!We are trying very hard and have almost finished designing the website. We have also almost finished developing the contract and are planning to launch the token as early as next week.Website: https://geckoai.ioTelegram: https://t.me/GeckoAIWe are currently in the process of developing an AI-based bot that will change the way you trade cryptocurrencies. Our bot will use the latest technology to analyze real-time data from coingecko monitoring and predict when cryptocurrency prices are likely to go up. We are also proud to announce that our bot capable of generating custom images from text, allowing you to get a visual representation of market trends and other relevant data on demand. Additionally, our bot will be able to generate cryptocurrency and other crypto charts as pictures, making it easier than ever to keep track of the market.What's more, our bot will notify you of new coins added to the coingecko monitoring and help you make informed decisions on whether to buy or not based on the coin's contract, potential, developer, and other factors. With our bot, you'll be one step ahead of the game and making smarter trades in no time.Join us on Telegram to stay up-to-date with our progress and be the first to experience the future of cryptocurrency trading!

comments.author: o48o
comments.body: Quote from: TG:GeckoAI on February 21, 2023, 10:15:50 PMHello, everyone!We are trying very hard and have almost finished designing the website. We have also almost finished developing the contract and are planning to launch the token as early as next week.-cut-Lots to do it seems. Do you have a whitepaper? Because whitepaper link on your page leads to telegram channel. In fact most of the links in there lead to telegram channel, even the uniswap buy link. Docs lead to medium blog .But if this is going to be an announcement you should move this to here and make this a proper announcement. If you are looking for opinions of your web page/project, you need to provide more information.

comments.author: redsun114
comments.body: The website needs a lot of work, things are not organized and although the UI isn't so bad, it could be improved. And as said by o48o, almost every hyperlink on the website takes you to the Telegram chat. I understand that the project is still under development but I believe if that was the case, you should have published it when everything was set.There are no docs, no whitepaper, limited information about the roadmap no dates, etc. Also, do you have any link to prove the partnerships mentioned on the website?

comments.author: Tytanowy Janusz
comments.body: Quote from: TG:GeckoAI on February 21, 2023, 10:15:50 PMJoin us on Telegram to stay up-to-date with our progress and be the first to experience the future of cryptocurrency trading!Its way too soon. No one will fallow a startup that looks to be 10 days old. Web is not ready, product is not ready, product is not even tested ... There is only a concept of how it could look like and a promise of almost printed tokens. Way to soon. Quote from: TG:GeckoAI on February 21, 2023, 10:15:50 PMWe are currently in the process of developing an AI-based bot that will change the way you trade cryptocurrencies. AI calculator is not a better solution than regular calculator. Not everything needs AI. Especially AI generated "visual representation of market".

comments.author: yhiaali3
comments.body: It seems that the site is still under development, however, trading bots based on artificial intelligence are increasingly popular, but this needs more work to complete all the needs of traders in a simple and easy way. And to also be able to compete with the robots that are already on the market.Therefore, we cannot judge the project until it is finally launched and tested on the ground.

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: I think you are trying to catch the word artificial intelligence as a trend and therefore free views, but your site needs a lot of work.Therefore, without real development, you may get temporary views, but you will not find long-term investments. Therefore, instead of focusing on the name and location, focus on the addition that can be made.

comments.author: FUCKBSVFUCK
comments.body: How would you do that? The bot will tell you what you are looking at. It is all about picking random images. Once you do that, the bot will give you a different list of coins. But, when you do that, no one knows you are at the top. So, the bot is telling you that you are using an AI for trading. It doesn't need any data to prove it, it doesn't need a lot of data. So, the bot will just give you an idea as to how to do that. And we will be working to make that bot

comments.author: Silberman
comments.body: Quote from: TG:GeckoAI on February 21, 2023, 10:15:50 PMHello, everyone!We are trying very hard and have almost finished designing the website. We have also almost finished developing the contract and are planning to launch the token as early as next week.Website: https://geckoai.ioTelegram: https://t.me/GeckoAIWe are currently in the process of developing an AI-based bot that will change the way you trade cryptocurrencies. Our bot will use the latest technology to analyze real-time data from coingecko monitoring and predict when cryptocurrency prices are likely to go up. We are also proud to announce that our bot capable of generating custom images from text, allowing you to get a visual representation of market trends and other relevant data on demand. Additionally, our bot will be able to generate cryptocurrency and other crypto charts as pictures, making it easier than ever to keep track of the market.What's more, our bot will notify you of new coins added to the coingecko monitoring and help you make informed decisions on whether to buy or not based on the coin's contract, potential, developer, and other factors. With our bot, you'll be one step ahead of the game and making smarter trades in no time.Join us on Telegram to stay up-to-date with our progress and be the first to experience the future of cryptocurrency trading!I understand that since ChatGPT was released there has been a craze about artificial intelligence not only in this market but it seems that it is taking all over the world, but at the same time it is obvious that a great deal of people are using those terms in order to try to make investors put their trust and their money into their projects, so assuming that the project is legitimate you are going to have a lot of trouble to find investors, as scammers have been releasing a lot of coins related to artificial intelligence.

comments.author: terciduk123
comments.body: Did the team temporarily halt the project? Updates stalled for a few months , The twitter account also only has 3 followers and a few short tweets, it's really sad

comments.author: disconnectme
comments.body: The issue I have now is that almost everyone wants to launch a token, this is completely crazy, you know how to code well, join a good project, if it is very hard for you to launch and maintain a website how in the world are you going to launch tokens and stick with it, you will just rug pull everyone. Not bad to want to create your own project but start from place and network, VCs will fund your idea or even the community, so it shouldn't be this hard

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: Quote from: terciduk123 on May 23, 2023, 06:42:44 PMDid the team temporarily halt the project? Updates stalled for a few months , The twitter account also only has 3 followers and a few short tweets, it's really sadPerhaps the word artificial intelligence is no longer a hot topic these days, many projects were very impulsive and the market was flooded with many of them, so it is natural for some of them to disappear, especially those for which there was no real development.Everyone's attempt to create his own coin in order to become rich is absurd thinking. The market does not need new projects, but rather real ideas and serious development.

comments.author: yhiaali3
comments.body: It looks like this site https://geckoai.io has been closed down:QuoteThis Account has been suspended.

comments.author: tvplus006
comments.body: Quote from: yhiaali3 on May 24, 2023, 04:04:56 PMIt looks like this site https://geckoai.io has been closed down:QuoteThis Account has been suspended.Given the fact that the paid hosting expires on 2024-02-16, it can be assumed that the blocking of the site by the provider was the result of complaints about the content posted on the site. If you want to get acquainted with the contents of this site, you can use the web archive: https://web.archive.org/web/20230508033517/https://geckoai.io/

comments.author: lobo13hf
comments.body: Quote from: terciduk123 on May 23, 2023, 06:42:44 PMDid the team temporarily halt the project? Updates stalled for a few months , The twitter account also only has 3 followers and a few short tweets, it's really sadsounds like a failed project to be honest, after all who truly invests in AI project, even though it has started some trend few months back, but this AI trend isn't really long lasting, heck even at the start of the trend it isn't as big as meme coin.

comments.author: Doan9269
comments.body: Quote from: lobo13hf on May 24, 2023, 10:31:09 PMQuote from: terciduk123 on May 23, 2023, 06:42:44 PMDid the team temporarily halt the project? Updates stalled for a few months , The twitter account also only has 3 followers and a few short tweets, it's really sadsounds like a failed project to be honest, after all who truly invests in AI project, even though it has started some trend few months back, but this AI trend isn't really long lasting, heck even at the start of the trend it isn't as big as meme coin.I will give this as a warning signals to us all that might be interested on investing in any of the AI development or projects as the case maybe, am not saying it's a bad idea or condemning the innovation behind everything in it but what we must to consider is the stage or face we are into as at now on this cause, which ia still a developmental stage, and i think investing on any by now will impose more risk on loosing money eince many of thos organizations promoting this have not even stated fully not to talk about investing with them, many are only using this avenue to scam those interested in it for now, let's be guided.

comments.author: abel1337
comments.body: Quote from: Doan9269 on May 27, 2023, 02:14:57 PMQuote from: lobo13hf on May 24, 2023, 10:31:09 PMQuote from: terciduk123 on May 23, 2023, 06:42:44 PMDid the team temporarily halt the project? Updates stalled for a few months , The twitter account also only has 3 followers and a few short tweets, it's really sadsounds like a failed project to be honest, after all who truly invests in AI project, even though it has started some trend few months back, but this AI trend isn't really long lasting, heck even at the start of the trend it isn't as big as meme coin.I will give this as a warning signals to us all that might be interested on investing in any of the AI development or projects as the case maybe, am not saying it's a bad idea or condemning the innovation behind everything in it but what we must to consider is the stage or face we are into as at now on this cause, which ia still a developmental stage, and i think investing on any by now will impose more risk on loosing money eince many of thos organizations promoting this have not even stated fully not to talk about investing with them, many are only using this avenue to scam those interested in it for now, let's be guided. I personally believe that AI projects will still have it's spotlight on the bull market. Actually I that AI project had launched on a good time where they can still make development about their product. But there are projects that took advantage of the trend and launched their project to gain funds and further scam their investors. We will see next bull market what AI project will be on top of their game. Just be careful on investing as scam projects are increasing nowadays just like this one that shows inactivity which is a big red flag.
